channel.title: Please help! I think my server is ddosed
channel.description:
Hey guys................... I was on early this morning and this guy got on and started spawning items and ip banning everyone.. Then when I got on he logged off and then I went to sleep.. When I tried to get back on just now i logged in with a black screen.. And when I Try to run my server I get this error.... [code]Exception in thread "main" java.lang.ExceptionInInitializerError Caused by: java.lang.ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException: 6 at server.world.ItemHandler.loadItemList(ItemHandler.java:381) at server.world.ItemHandler.<init>(ItemHandler.java:33) at server.Server.<clinit>(Server.java:58) Could not find the main class: server.Server. Program will exit. Press any key to continue . . .[/code]
PLEASE HELP ME!!!

item.title: Please help! I think my server is ddosed
item.dc:creator: @splinter-x splinter-x
item.source: Please help! I think my server is ddosed

item.title: Please help! I think my server is ddosed

item.description:
@zyle1992 wrote:

and item in your items.cfg file isn’t properly formatted.

Read full topic

@splinter-x wrote:

Hey guys… I was on early this morning and this guy got on and started spawning items and ip banning everyone… Then when I got on he logged off and then I went to sleep… When I tried to get back on just now i logged in with a black screen… And when I Try to run my server I get this error…

Exception in thread "main" java.lang.ExceptionInInitializerError Caused by: java.lang.ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException: 6 at server.world.ItemHandler.loadItemList(ItemHandler.java:381) at server.world.ItemHandler.<init>(ItemHandler.java:33) at server.Server.<clinit>(Server.java:58) Could not find the main class: server.Server. Program will exit. Press any key to continue . . .

PLEASE HELP ME!!!
